.about, .experience, .contact, .methodology { background-color: var(--background-color); }
.translations, .other-projects { background-color: var(--background-alt-color); } /* Use alt color for translations and other projects */
/* Removed redundant .projects background rule */

/* Grids */
.translations-grid, .other-projects-grid { /* Combined rule for both grids */
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: var(--space-lg);
}
/* Removed separate .projects-grid rule */

/* ...existing code... */

/* Specific Card Styles */
.translation-card, .project-card {
    background-color: var(--background-color); /* Ensure cards have the main background */
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
    overflow: hidden;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

/* ...existing code... */

    /* ...existing code... */

    /* Responsive Grid Layouts */
    .translations-grid, .other-projects-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); } /* Combined rule */

    /* ...existing code... */

### [styles.css](file:///c%3A/Users/alpya/Documents/GitHub/AlpWebsite/styles.css)

Update the CSS to make the Other Projects section less prominent than Translations and fix grid styling:

```css
/* Section Backgrounds */
.about, .experience, .contact, .methodology { background-color: var(--background-color); }
.translations, .other-projects { background-color: var(--background-alt-color); } /* Use alt color for translations and other projects */

/* Project Grids */
.translations-grid, .other-projects-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: var(--space-lg);
}

/* Make Other Projects less prominent */
.other-projects {
    opacity: 0.9; /* Slightly reduce opacity */
}

.other-projects .section-title {
    font-size: 1.8em; /* Slightly smaller than other section titles */
}

/* Keep Translation section prominent */
.translations .section-title {
    font-size: 2em;
    font-weight: 700;
}

/* Responsive Grid Layouts */
@media (min-width: 768px) {
    .translations-grid, .other-projects-grid { 
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); 
    }
}
```

These changes will:
1. Combine the two project sections into a single "Other Projects" section
2. Update all navigation and footer links to point to the new section
3. Make the "Other Projects" section slightly less prominent than the "Translations" section 
4. Ensure the grid layout works consistently across both sections

---
